output.sentences: Joe took an assignment to take lots of pictures with people using various facial expressions and props, the first being of two women.
Next he took a picture of two men who decided to hide one eye with flowers.
The next picture was of a confident dude in a pair of sunglasses.
The confident dude was so impressive that he took another picture of him and his friend, both of whom had mustaches.
The final photo featured a smiling man and woman who wore bright red lipstick.
